sen.j: 楠 宏（くすのき こう、1921年11月18日 -）は、日本の地球物理学、地理学者である。
sen.e: Ko KUSUNOKI (November 18, 1921 -) is a Japanese geophysicist and geographer.
Ko KUSUNOKI (November 18, 1921 -) is a Japanese geophysicist and geographer.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Ko KUSUNOKI (November 18, 1921 -) is a Japanese geophysicist and geographer.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 専門は、雪氷学、極圏の地誌学。
sen.e: He specializes in glaciology and regional geography in polar circle.
He specializes in glaciology and regional geography in the polar circle.
sen.cmt: polarの前にtheを追加しました。
sen.e: He specializes in glaciology and regional geography in the polar circle.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 北海道釧路市出身。
sen.e: He was born in Kushiro City, Hokkaido.
He was born in Kushiro City, Hokkaido.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: He was born in Kushiro City, Hokkaido.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 楠木正成の子孫にあたるという。
sen.e: He is a descendant of Masashige KUSUNOKI.
He is a descendant of Masashige KUSUNOKI..
sen.cmt: ピリオドを追加しました。
sen.e: He is a descendant of Masashige KUSUNOKI..
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1944年：北海道大学理学部物理学科を卒業。
sen.e: In 1948: He graduated from Department of Physics, school of science in Hokkaido University.
In 1944: He graduated from Department of Physics, school of science in Hokkaido University.
1944: He graduated from Department of Physics, school of science in Hokkaido University.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 1948年：北大助教授となる。
sen.e: In 1948: He became assistant professor in Hokkaido University.
In 1948: He became assistant professor in Hokkaido University.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: 1948: He became assistant professor in Hokkaido University.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 1956年9月：第1次南極地域観測隊に選ばれる。
sen.e: In September 1956: He was selected for the 1st Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: オリジナルには「日本」とはありませんが、南極地域観測隊の名称としてはJapanese Antarctic Research Expedition（ＪＡＲＥ）です。
sen.e: In September 1956: He was selected for the 1st Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: September 1956: He was selected for the 1st Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 1966年：アメリカ合衆国国務省の招待でバード基地及び南極点を視察。
sen.e: In 1966: He visited Byrd Station and South Pole with invitation of Department of State of the United States of America.
In 1966: He visited Byrd Station and the South Pole with invitation of the Department of State of the United States of America.
sen.cmt: SouthおよびDepartmentの前にtheを追加しました。
sen.e: 1966: He visited Byrd Station and the South Pole with invitation of the Department of State of the United States of America.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 第8次南極観測副隊長。
sen.e: He was the second in command on the 8th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: オリジナルには「日本」とはありませんが、南極地域観測隊の名称としてはJapanese Antarctic Research Expedition（ＪＡＲＥ）です。
sen.e: He was the second in command on the 8th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: He was the second in command on the 8th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1968年：第10次南極観測隊長に就任。
sen.e: In 1968: He was appointed to the leader of the 10th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
In 1968: He assumed the post of leader of the 10th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 「任命された」だけではなく「就任」しているのでwas appointed to the をassumed the post ofに書き換えました。
sen.e: 1968: He assumed the post of leader of the 10th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 1969年2月：第10次南極越冬隊長に就任。
sen.e: In February 1969: He was appointed to the leader of the 10th Antarctic wintering party.
In February 1969: He assumed the post of leader of the 10th Antarctic wintering party.
sen.cmt: 同上
sen.e: February 1969: He assumed the post of leader of the 10th Antarctic wintering party.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 1972年：第14次南極観測隊長に就任。
sen.e: In 1972: He was appointed to the leader of the 14th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
In 1972: He assumed the post of leader of the 14th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 同上
sen.e: 1972: He assumed the post of leader of the 14th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 帰国後、国立科学博物館極地研究部資料部長に就任。
sen.e: He was appointed to Manager of material department in the polar research department in National Museum of Nature and Science after a return home.
After returning home, he assumed the post of Manager of the archive division of the polar research department in the National Museum of Nature and Science.
sen.cmt: 同上。また研究部資料部をthe archive division of the polar research departmentとしました。さらに文末のafter a return homeをafter returning homeとし文頭におきました。
sen.e: After returning home, he assumed the post of Manager of the archive division of the polar research department in the National Museum of Nature and Science.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1973年：国立極地研究所研究主幹に就任。
sen.e: In 1973: He was appointed to the chief researcher of National Institute of Polar Research.
In 1973: He assumed the post of chief researcher of National Institute of Polar Research.
sen.cmt: 「任命された」だけではなく「就任」しているのでwas appointed to the をassumed the post ofに書き換えました。
sen.e: 1973: He assumed the post of chief researcher of National Institute of Polar Research.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 1976年：第18次南極観測隊長に就任。
sen.e: In 1976: He was appointed to the leader of the 18th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
In 1976: He assumed the post of leader of the 18th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 同上
sen.e: 1976: He assumed the post of leader of the 18th Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 1977年2月：第18次南極越冬隊長に就任。
sen.e: In 1977: He was appointed to the leader of the 18th Antarctic wintering party.
In February 1977: Heassumed the post of leader of the 18th Antarctic wintering party.
sen.cmt: 訳抜け：Februaryを追加しました。以下、同上。
sen.e: February 1977: Heassumed the post of leader of the 18th Antarctic wintering party.
sen.cmt: 統一リスト従い、Inを削除しました。

sen.j: 国立極地研究所名誉教授。
sen.e: He is an emeritus professor in National Institute of Polar Research.
He is an emeritus professor in the National Institute of Polar Research.
sen.cmt: Nationalの前にtheを追加しました。
sen.e: He is an emeritus professor in the National Institute of Polar Research.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 第10次・第14次・第18次の3次にわたり南極観測隊長を務め、そのうち第10次と第18次では越冬隊長も務めた。
sen.e: He was appointed to the leader of Japanese Antarctic Research Expedition for three times, in 10th, 14th and 18th expedition and he also took position of the leader for Antarctic wintering party in 10th and 18th expedition.
He led the 10th, 14th and 18th Japanese Antarctic Research Expeditions and also led the10th and 18th Antarctic wintering parties.
sen.cmt: 「任命された」だけではなく「務め」ている意味が訳出できていないこと、また文全体が冗長なので書き換えました。
sen.e: He led the 10th, 14th and 18th Japanese Antarctic Research Expeditions and also led the10th and 18th Antarctic wintering parties.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 百科事典において北極圏及び南極圏の地理に関する項目を数多く執筆した。
sen.e: He has written many items related to geography about the Arctic Circle and the Antarctic Circle in encyclopedia.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He has written many items related to geography about the Arctic Circle and the Antarctic Circle in encyclopedias.
sen.cmt: encyclopediaを複数形にしました。
sen.e: He has written many items related to geography about the Arctic Circle and the Antarctic Circle in encyclopedias.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 日本における極地地誌の第一人者であるといえる。
sen.e: He is the leading authority on the polar regions geography in Japan.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He is Japan's leading authority on the topography of the polar regions.
sen.cmt: 「地誌」はtopographyとすべきと思われます。In Japan は文末に置くとpolar regionsと近くなり地名が続いてしまうのでleading の前でJapan'sとしました。
sen.e: He is Japan's leading authority on the topography of the polar regions.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
